Query¶

class src.query.Query(residues, first, last)[source]¶
class Query¶

This class groups informations about a query sequence.

residues¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

Type:list of Residue objects
first¶

First residue of the query sequence.

Type:int
last¶

Last residue of the query sequence.

Type:int
